[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "
NON-DISCLOSURE AGREEMENT
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

I, __________________________________ I.C. No. / Passport No. __________________________ hereby declare as follows:

.
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
1) I fully understand the obligations that I will not at any time during the continuance of my employment or thereafter, except with the prior written approval of Air Cat Logistics Sdn Bhd, divulge to any person or company knowledge or information as to the security practice, business dealings, accounting matter, quotation or affairs of the Company or of any of its customers or clients or as to any other matter which may come to my knowledge during the course of my employment with the Company, except to Air Cat Logistics Sdn Bhd employee who is entitled to receive it or to persons who are entitled to receive the same in accordance with the laws of Negara Brunei Darussalam. .
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

2) I understand I am restricted & prohibited to duplicate softcopy and or hardcopy information from the company, using electronic or copying devices such as hard-disks, laptops, pendrive, electronic files, printers or hardcopy files, folders, quotations, documents and any other company’s document, for sole purpose of directly or indirectly extracting information from the company. .
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

3) I fully understand that the information, which can be in writing or any other form of media and oral discussion or other information of an intangible nature and the information supplied by Air Cat Logistics Sdn Bhd remains the property of the Company and shall be received in strict confidence. .
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

4) I shall at all times abide by the Company’s code of ethics as stipulated in the Company’s Human Resources Policy), which may be periodically revised by the Company. .
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

5) I confirm that I have not been convicted of any drug-related offences, nor have I been convicted of any offence involving fraud or dishonesty in any country. .
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

6) I understand that any breach of confidence on my part, as hereinbefore expressed, shall render me liable to disciplinary and/or legal action. .
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

7) I confirm that I have read and comprehend the Company’s Human Resource Policy. I understand that any breach in the Standard of Conduct on my part shall render me liable to disciplinary and/or legal action.
.
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
SIGNED by:-
.
NAME
DEPARTMENT
AIR CAT LOGISTICS SDN BHD
"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
Signature
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
SIGNED by:-
.
NAME
DEPARTMENT
Corporate Department
AIR CAT LOGISTICS SDN BHD
"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
Signature
"}]
